figure_1.title: Figure 1. Number of abstract submissions and publications by year from 2018 to 2022. Note submissions were collected from five conferences, publications were collected from seven conferences.

figure_2.title: Figure 2. Number of journal article submissions and publications by year from 2018 to 2022. Note submissions were collected from six journals, publications were collected from 10 journals.

claims.sentence: Conference submissions trended downward over time, with 15,308 in 2018, 15,420 in 2019, 14,194 in 2020, 12,292 in 2021 and 13,623 in 2022 (p=0.11; Figure 1).
Published conference abstracts from the seven selected conferences followed a very similar trajectory trending downward over time, from 13,111 in 2018 to 11,848 in 2022 (p=0.16; Figure 1).

Open in a new tabJournal submissions
Journal submissions were available from six journals and increased from 14,142 in 2018 to a peak of 20,241 in 2020 (2018 vs. 2020: p<0.001), and then declined to 15,164 in 2022 (Figure 2).
The total number of published articles from 10 journals showed no clear trends over time, with a slight decrease after 2020 (p=0.64; Figure 2).
Conference submissions trended downward over time, with 15,308 in 2018, 15,420 in 2019, 14,194 in 2020, 12,292 in 2021 and 13,623 in 2022 (p=0.11; Figure 1).
Published conference abstracts from the seven selected conferences followed a very similar trajectory trending downward over time, from 13,111 in 2018 to 11,848 in 2022 (p=0.16; Figure 1).
